meanings.definition: A large, thin, flat case for loose sheets of paper such as drawings or maps.
meanings.sent1: I carried my drawings in a portfolio to keep them safe.
meanings.sent2: The architect presented his designs in a leather portfolio.
meanings.sent3: The portfolio decided to take a vacation and explore the world.
meanings.sent4: Her portfolio of secrets was as carefully guarded as a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The portfolio, like a protective shield, held all her important papers together.

meanings.definition: A range of investments held by a person or organization.
meanings.sent1: His portfolio included stocks, bonds, and real estate.
meanings.sent2: She diversified her portfolio to minimize risk.
meanings.sent3: The portfolio of investments threw a party to celebrate their growth.
meanings.sent4: His portfolio of stocks was like a garden, needing constant attention to flourish.
meanings.sent5: The portfolio of assets gleamed like a treasure trove waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: A set of pieces of creative work collected by someone to display their skills.
meanings.sent1: Her portfolio showcased her best paintings and sculptures.
meanings.sent2: He presented his photography portfolio at the art exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The portfolio of artwork decided to have a dance-off to show off their talents.
meanings.sent4: His portfolio of creations was a colorful garden blooming with talent.
meanings.sent5: The portfolio of masterpieces sparkled like a constellation in the night sky.
